output.content:
The balance as at 30 September 2022 represented receivables of rental and property management income due from Haining Wanpu amounting to CNY634.0K. The Target recognised revenue using straight-line method; we reclassified the levelling impact of revenue recognition in the rent-free period to other non-current assets at the end of September 2022. Management did not accrue bad debt provision for accounts receivables from Haining Wanpu, we indicatively accrued provision at the rate of 1% according to the Targetâ€™s policy.

SUMMARY: Used entity 'Haining Wanpu' with amounts: CNY634.0K (receivables)
